about_the_game:
Three sparkling droplets, each of which call a Shining Pom down from the heavens to grant the Attack and Support Members of your party a free level up mid-battle. After the battle, you'll also be given 1 Zeram Powder (unless you already have 99 of them).

Shining Pom Droplet x 3

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. They can only be used during a battle.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
